https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/i3SVeqIcwGx9CE1hZlBFeFHs5Lb.jpg The final part of a trilogy of films started in 1998, exploring the filming of projected light through distorting lenses. Shot and edited on Super-8, the film features a carefully constructed electronic soundtrack made with Helliwell's tone generators. Beyond the Light
